name: discord-vscode
description: Update your discord status with the newly added rich presence.

commands.title: Enable Discord Presence in the current workspace
Disable Discord Presence in the current workspace

discord.clientID.description: Only modify this if you know what you are doing (most of you don't)

discord.enabled.description: Controls if Discord Presence is active

discord.reconnectThreshold.description: Decides how often a reconnect attempt should be made before stopping

discord.detailsEditing.description: Custom string for the details section of the rich presence

discord.detailsDebugging.description: Custom string for the details section of the rich presence when debugging

discord.detailsIdle.description: Custom string for the details section of the rich presence when idling

discord.lowerDetailsEditing.description: Custom string for the state section of the rich presence

discord.lowerDetailsDebugging.description: Custom string for the state section of the rich presence when debugging

discord.lowerDetailsIdle.description: Custom string for the state section of the rich presence when idling

discord.lowerDetailsNotFound.description: Custom string for the state section of the rich presence when no workspace is found

discord.largeImage.description: Custom string for the largeImageText section of the rich presence

discord.largeImageIdle.description: Custom string for the largeImageText section of the rich presence when idling

discord.smallImage.description: Custom string for the smallImageText section of the rich presence

discord.silent.description: Decides if error messages are shown to the user
